instruction: Summarize the key findings of the study on the impact of digital credit on borrowers.
output: The study evaluates the impact of access to digital credit on several dimensions of borrower welfare, including financial health, resilience, women's economic empowerment, and subjective well-being. The study uses pre-registered and pre-specified summary indices to aggregate related variables and constructs the summary index as the mean of the z-scores of the component variables. The impact of the two randomized treatments on these four families of outcome indices are presented in Table 2.
